response.overview: Magdy's death snatches his wife, Nabila, from him, leaving him with a little girl who suffers the same torment that her father endures. The husband keeps his memory of his wife and devotes all his attention to caring for his daughter. On one occasion, he goes to buy a doll for his daughter in a shop The bride is surprised by a woman
response.title: رحمة من السماء
